name: n8n Knowledge Base
description: AI-powered knowledge base with 543 n8n nodes, 2,709 workflow templates, and comprehensive documentation to help build workflows

auth.note: No authentication required for knowledge base queries. Optional n8n API integration available via environment variables.

N8N_API_URL.label: n8n API URL (Optional)
N8N_API_URL.description: Your n8n instance URL for workflow management features (e.g., https://your-instance.app.n8n.cloud)

N8N_API_KEY.label: n8n API Key (Optional)
N8N_API_KEY.description: API key for authenticating with your n8n instance
